summary: Completed comprehensive testing of vulnerability scanner application. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has critical React runtime errors preventing proper UI functionality.

warnings.issue: Warning about bcrypt version reading - non-critical

critical_bugs.issue: Maximum update depth exceeded - infinite loop in component re-rendering
critical_bugs.impact: Complete UI breakdown, prevents scan creation and other interactions

ui_bugs.issue: Chart width/height errors - charts not rendering properly

integration_issues.issue: Start scan button not accessible due to React errors

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix React infinite loop error in frontend. The 'Maximum update depth exceeded' error is preventing proper UI functionality. Issue appears to be in component state management or useEffect dependencies. Backend is fully functional.
